title: futuur
author: futuur
content: World Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcup

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupI don't see any customer service on this website. This is quite difficult for me to ask a few things about this site. So I think it is necessary to have online customer service on this site, to make it easier for potential users or users to ask things that are considered important.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on October 14, 2022, 05:30:49 PMQuote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupI don't see any customer service on this website. This is quite difficult for me to ask a few things about this site. So I think it is necessary to have online customer service on this site, to make it easier for potential users or users to ask things that are considered important.Maybe you can just throw your questions here if you have doubts?As far as I know, futuur has been in this community for years now and I have tested their platform quite a few times already.But let's see about the worldcup, to be honest, I'm not really into this sport, but if there are good betting options then I might try to test my luck or just wait for our tipsters here.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on October 14, 2022, 06:23:27 PMQuote from: fathafraink on October 14, 2022, 05:30:49 PMQuote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PM~Snip~~Snip~But let's see about the worldcup, to be honest, I'm not really into this sportExactly what was on my mind, I am not a sports man, most especially when it has to do with football, not that I don't like the game but I am a very busy person, I hardly have any time at all to give attention to watching football match and following it up.Anyways, we are here and waiting for the 2022 world cup, I will watch this thread closely from now, just incase I find time to follow the game, I might be putting up a bet or two at futuur, let's see how it goes.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 14, 2022, 06:46:08 PMAnyways, we are here and waiting for the 2022 world cupBusy or not, we will make time to follow the world cup. Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!I understand that you and your business want to be the first mover and get some advantage over the competition, but there's still an entire month (plus some days) until the matches begin.I would not expect too many people get into the mood and start betting this early. (But maybe I don't know.)

comments.author: Haunebu
comments.body: It's been a long time since I last placed some long-term predictions on your site Future team which is why I am excited to place some outright bets as long as the odds seem favorable for me.Quote from: NeuroticFish on October 14, 2022, 06:51:03 PMI would not expect too many people get into the mood and start betting this early. (But maybe I don't know.)I guess some people would want to place outrights and other long-term predictions soon which is why their announcement at this point of time makes sense.

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupThat has quite a potential strategy, I've seen a lot of volume and bet using real money now, and the website looks like it is growing up every day. And so talking about World Cup,  A group is a little bit hard to predict between Qatar, Senegal, and Ecuador who will walk together with the Netherlands to 2nd round. Quote from: fathafraink on October 14, 2022, 05:30:49 PMI don't see any customer service on this website. This is quite difficult for me to ask a few things about this site. So I think it is necessary to have online customer service on this site, to make it easier for potential users or users to ask things that are considered important.You can ask the question here : Futuur - Predict the Future!,  we are already on this site since 2 years ago which means this site has customers and you can register and try anything with or without using real money (Ooms token)

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupAt last you come around the forum to advertise your site and bring predictions outside your ANN Thread as you have been here for years now .Like most of here, I am also waiting for World Cup 2022 so indeed that we may be interested in finding actions betting and watching the game.also thanks for bringing this here , it add flavor to our gambling activities .

comments.author: Chato1977
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupHey yo futuur , its always good seeing you having active in Bitcointalk , waiting for the final but putting my prediction now using my Omz and of course my remaining funds in your site .Quote from: DroomieChikito on October 15, 2022, 01:13:16 AMQuote from: fathafraink on October 14, 2022, 05:30:49 PMI don't see any customer service on this website. This is quite difficult for me to ask a few things about this site. So I think it is necessary to have online customer service on this site, to make it easier for potential users or users to ask things that are considered important.You can ask the question here : Futuur - Predict the Future!,  we are already on this site since 2 years ago which means this site has customers and you can register and try anything with or without using real money (Ooms token)don't know what made Him that statement when he did not even check the original thread of futuur that is active since 2 years now .

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on October 14, 2022, 06:23:27 PMQuote from: fathafraink on October 14, 2022, 05:30:49 PMQuote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupI don't see any customer service on this website. This is quite difficult for me to ask a few things about this site. So I think it is necessary to have online customer service on this site, to make it easier for potential users or users to ask things that are considered important.Maybe you can just throw your questions here if you have doubts?As far as I know, futuur has been in this community for years now and I have tested their platform quite a few times already.But let's see about the worldcup, to be honest, I'm not really into this sport, but if there are good betting options then I might try to test my luck or just wait for our tipsters here.Yes they are in the business for more time now, so it’s high time that they should be more professional.A customer support is indeed required inside the site to resolve queries, doubts and confusions etc. What will the user do if he doesn’t visit this forum? How will he/she contact the site’s team in case of any confusion and difficulties?Nevertheless I am a huge fan of World Cup, so definitely if the markets and odds will be excellent, then I will also place some bets and gamble on my luck.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupWell, so far it is not in the trend, judging by the size of the bets, WC 2022 is still more than a month away, so there is a website https://wcibets.club / on which you can bet on the upcoming WC matches in the future, so I don't see any point in making any bets on this event now, I hope it will be in demand closer to the beginning.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupI had previously seen an announcement of your site in 2020 and saw that it had a signature campaign by Hhampuz. I will try to catch some bets using this site and hope this site works well though I have never used it before but this time I will try to create a new experience using it.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: coinerer on October 16, 2022, 08:51:49 AMQuote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupI had previously seen an announcement of your site in 2020 and saw that it had a signature campaign by Hhampuz. I will try to catch some bets using this site and hope this site works well though I have never used it before but this time I will try to create a new experience using it.They have their own currency that can be used there (the name is oms) as a bet but that doesn't give you any advantage, just as a means to test and see how betting in the futuur works.A big tournament that will attract many spectators as well as sports betting lovers to bet and profit from the event

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on October 16, 2022, 10:19:15 AMQuote from: coinerer on October 16, 2022, 08:51:49 AMQuote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupI had previously seen an announcement of your site in 2020 and saw that it had a signature campaign by Hhampuz. I will try to catch some bets using this site and hope this site works well though I have never used it before but this time I will try to create a new experience using it.They have their own currency that can be used there (the name is oms) as a bet but that doesn't give you any advantage, just as a means to test and see how betting in the futuur works.A big tournament that will attract many spectators as well as sports betting lovers to bet and profit from the eventif he really does want to bet, better use the real coins like btc, ltc, doge, trx and others and not the ooms. futuur has been here in this forum and it seems no one is having any prob with them. but if you are still in doubt, you can bet small. maybe, if futuur can hold some type of wagering contest during this world cup, i believe, they can attract more bettors.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!  Futuur will offer markets on every game through the final, and lots more. Get in on the action & make your bet on the future of football! ⚽ #worldcupWhy there's a need to create another thread, why not just update the ANN thread?Well, I've seen this site before and I can say that they offer a lot of bet not just about sports and almost on everything. It's also good to have promotions from time to time, your signature campaign was almost 2 years ago, maybe it's a good time now to have another so you can attract more bettors. Probably, many gamblers will just place their bet on the world cup Qatar instead of this site, just saying.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Haven't checked out your site in a while. May I know whether you are offering any special promos for us in this Fifa world cup? I mean why would I join your site while I have so many reputed options on hand including sportsbet, stake etc. I would consider give it a try if there's any special promo during the world cup. Let me know if you have already.

comments.author: Crypto_I.N
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on October 14, 2022, 06:51:03 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 14, 2022, 06:46:08 PMAnyways, we are here and waiting for the 2022 world cupBusy or not, we will make time to follow the world cup. Quote from: futuur on October 14, 2022, 02:45:17 PMWorld Cup Qatar 2022 is almost here!I understand that you and your business want to be the first mover and get some advantage over the competition, but there's still an entire month (plus some days) until the matches begin.I would not expect too many people get into the mood and start betting this early. (But maybe I don't know.)with the World Cup which is held every four years, many people have moved from yesterday to get bigger benefits from the world football show in Qatar this year, now many world-class players are in their clubs. many are injured such as the Argentine national team which many people bet on supporting the country, Argentina is now improving with what is feared such as Lionel Messi's injury Angel De Maria which is worried that these players will not play and that's not all there are many players who are injured. now for not good at his club

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on October 16, 2022, 05:04:29 PMHaven't checked out your site in a while. May I know whether you are offering any special promos for us in this Fifa world cup? I mean why would I join your site while I have so many reputed options on hand including sportsbet, stake etc. I would consider give it a try if there's any special promo during the world cup. Let me know if you have already.Upon checking they don’t have an attractive bonuses, this is the problem with Futuur they are lack with promotions and it’s hard to attract gamblers if you don’t have any. I wish to hear good news as well from Futuur since I’ve been part of their signature campaign before, they should have more promotions and bonuses, this seems to be more effective on every gambling site.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Glad to see you are back on this forum with an update on your site. And yes, the World Cup Qatar 2022 is just around the corner and having a bet for the World Cup can get many people to visit your site and place their bets.I remember still having a few Ounces balance on your site and I hope it can be used as a bet in addition to using other coins. I hope there will be another notification on your site so that it will give more visitors to place bets there.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: As the start of WC 2022 in Qatar approaches, the hype around this event will help attract attention to betting on matches, it will be a time of fun for fans and hopefully gamblers, and the site will become in demand.
